item.title: How I ate unprocessed food for a year on a budget - and how you can too
item.description:
How I ate unprocessed food for a year on a budget - and how you can too

In January of 2012, I set myself a challenge. I would go an entire year without eating processed food. All foods are processed, of course, at least to some degree-cooking is a kind of process, as is dicing, heat, fermenting, and preserving.

item.title: 10 High-Protein Meatless Meal Options for Vegetarians
item.description:
10 High-Protein Meatless Meal Options for Vegetarians

This article talks about high-protein vegetarian dinner recipes which contain no meat along with in dept recipes and step by step guide. Recipes like quinoa fried rice, garlic quinoa, mushroom risotto, bajra khchdi, matkli pulao and many more are in the list.

item.title: Every Body Part is in the Palm of Your Hand - Press the Points to Relieve Pain - DavidWolfe.com
item.description:
Every Body Part is in the Palm of Your Hand - Press the Points to Relieve Pain - DavidWolfe.com

Constant pain or discomfort is a common disorder that affects over 100 million people in the USA. Unfortunately, when it comes to chronic pain, Western medicine just doesn't cut it. Medications are commonly used to mask the pain, but real medical treatment options under the American medical-pharmaceutical mafia are not legally allowed.

item.title: 23 Recipes To Make You A Lean, Mean, Clean-Eating Machine - Allrecipes
item.description:
23 Recipes To Make You A Lean, Mean, Clean-Eating Machine - Allrecipes

Clean Eating is simple. Essentially, clean eating is about eating more healthy foods and fewer unhealthy, heavily processed or refined foods and foods with added sugars and unhealthy fats. We're talking fresh, whole ingredients, organic and eaten in season when possible, and prepared in unfussy ways that highlight natural flavors.

item.title: The Best DIY Detox Juices
item.description:
The Best DIY Detox Juices

Whether you've resolved to get healthier or just want to atone for indulgence on New Year's Eve, these recipes will come in handy. 1. Cilantro-Celery Juice Punch This bright green blend gets its zippy, herby taste from an entire bunch of cilantro. 2. Fresh Apple-Celery Juice with Ginger and Parsley Sweet and tangy, this blend is super-refreshing.

item.title: 30 Unhealthy Foods You Mistake As Healthy and Their Surprising Swaps
item.description:
30 Unhealthy Foods You Mistake As Healthy and Their Surprising Swaps

Let's face it, the Standard American Diet (S.A.D.) is terrible. We're led to believe that unhealthy foods are healthy simply because of the overuse of trendy "diet fads" and clever marketing. item.title: Nutrition Advice From the China Study
item.description:
Nutrition Advice From the China Study

Six years ago a small Texas publisher released an obscure book written by a father-son research team. The work, based on a series of studies conducted in rural China and Taiwan, challenged the conventional wisdom about health and nutrition by espousing the benefits of a plant-based diet.
